alert.note: Alert for City of Alexandria; Fairfax; Prince William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:24PM EDT until August 07 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR THE SOUTHEASTERN DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA...SOUTH CENTRAL ANNE ARUNDEL...NORTHWESTERN CALVERT...PRINCE GEORGES...CHARLES... SOUTHEASTERN FAIRFAX...AND SOUTHEASTERN PRINCE WILLIAM COUNTIES AND THE SOUTHEASTERN CITY OF ALEXANDRIA... At 624 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Crofton to near La Plata, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Waldorf, Bowie, Clinton, Fort Washington, Fort Hunt, Groveton, Forestville, Largo, Coral Hills, La Plata, Fort Belvoir, Shady Side, Woodbridge, National Harbor, Upper Marlboro, Fedex Field, Rhode River, Port Tobacco River and Andrews Air Force Base. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for District of Columbia...central and southern Maryland...and northern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: City of Alexandria; Fairfax; Prince William
